name: Doki Doki Carpe Diem: Somnium
storyline: What is this MOD about? Facing your fears and discovering truths.
summary: Doki Doki Somnium is a mod for the game Doki Doki Literature Club that offers a unique and immersive experience, exploring themes of suspense and mystery. Developed by -M!, the mod is known for its tense atmosphere and intriguing narrative, challenging players to face their fears and uncover hidden truths. Although it is considered short-lived, Somnium leaves a lasting impression due to its emotional depth and disturbing elements.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: THIS DDLC MOD IS TERRIFYING! | Somnium (DDLC Mods) #1
